short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to calculate the winning probabilities and odds from Expected Goals (xG) scores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock Match Insights with the Expected Goals (xG) Calculator

- Winning Probability – Transform expected goals (xG) into clear and easy-to-understand winning probabilities for each team.  
- Odds – Quickly calculate American, European, and UK odds in one step.
